document_data.name: Firegel
document_data.creator: [[Hedge wizard]]s
document_data.mainbody: '''Babblejuice''' was an [[alchemical]] substance that made people talk too much.
document_data.Powers: It caused the imbiber to suddenly start speaking of anything that came to mind for up to four hours. Truthfulness and intelligibility were not guaranteed.
document_data.History: The substance was difficult to synthesize,{{Cite dragon/163/Hedge Wizards|24}} requiring a combination of solid alchemical and herbal skills; [[hedge wizard]]s often traded in it. It sold for about 200 [[gold pieces]].
